data.text: @SMankuta @CoachAntor @esportsmike @LSAbarn @robscottjohnson @ECAC_Esports @SUNY_Esports We are learning from the announcement order, and will take this into consideration for the future.

@LeagueSpotGG @CoachAntor @esportsmike @LSAbarn @robscottjohnson @ECAC_Esports @SUNY_Esports While we appreciate the "listening to the community" sentiment, lack of representation means those marginalized communities are still not being heard. The follow up panel gives an "after thought" vibe which is the exact problem these communities face.
@LeagueSpotGG @CoachAntor @esportsmike @LSAbarn @robscottjohnson @ECAC_Esports @SUNY_Esports Smooth. Will be tuned to both panels.
@WayneLBlack1 @CoachAntor @esportsmike @LSAbarn @robscottjohnson @ECAC_Esports @SUNY_Esports This is one of the questions that will be addressed upfront.

@LeagueSpotGG @CoachAntor @esportsmike @LSAbarn @robscottjohnson @ECAC_Esports @SUNY_Esports One question I have for the panelists beyond increasing representation (e.g. adding more women, Black/Brown, or LGBTQIA+) is what is being done to make the field more intentionally inclusive for ppl who represent those identities?

@LeagueSpotGG @cutiepebbs @CoachAntor @esportsmike @LSAbarn @robscottjohnson @ECAC_Esports @SUNY_Esports I would also like to point out that we, too, know the difference between a diversity panel and diverse panelists. We are asking these questions because we want clarification. Snark shouldn't be the response.

@LeagueSpotGG @cutiepebbs @CoachAntor @esportsmike @LSAbarn @robscottjohnson @ECAC_Esports @SUNY_Esports This is why that information shouldn't have been a delayed "part 2". It should have been obvious that people would want the clarification as to the why you decided to have lack of representation right off the bat in the "part 1".

@Kiraeyl @LeagueSpotGG @cutiepebbs @CoachAntor @esportsmike @LSAbarn @robscottjohnson @ECAC_Esports @SUNY_Esports Wait, so you have a 6-person all male panel, but you're having a separate panel with women to discuss why you have poorly represented women!? What in the ridiculousness is this?

@cutiepebbs @Kiraeyl @CoachAntor @esportsmike @LSAbarn @robscottjohnson @ECAC_Esports @SUNY_Esports We understand the difference between a diversity panel and diverse panelists.

So no, it will not be a diversity panel.
